data.title: David Gene Robbins Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: David Gene Robbins of Cabot, Arkansas passed away on April 25, 2024. He was born in Manila, Arkansas to William "Bill" Robbins and Odessa "Dessie" Young.He is survived by his da...
data.text:
David Gene Robbins of Cabot, Arkansas passed away on April 25, 2024. He was born in Manila, Arkansas to William “Bill” Robbins and Odessa “Dessie” Young.

He is survived by his daughter Terri (Mark) Frazier; grandchildren, Brett (Taryn) Frazier, Matthew (Melanie) Burt, Bryan (Shannon) Brooks, Whitney (Jason) Taylor, Blake (Marcy) Brooks; nine great-grandchildren and other extended family and friends.

He is preceded in death by his wife Doris Robbins, his siblings Aline Castleberry, Bill Robbins, Ruth Altrui, and Ray Robbins, and children Gary Brooks and Pattie Burt.

Gene served four years in the U.S. Air Force before meeting Doris. He enjoyed his family, friends, and attending his church. He was an avid Razorbacks fan! He grew up playing basketball and would make trips to Fayetteville to watch the Hogs play. He loved to travel and also loved to play card games with his friends and family.

Memorials may be made to the Alzheimer’s Association, https://www.alz.org/arkansas
